name: Oh Sheep! (Carlos Chamizo Cano, jvicog, GuillermoZexiam, IvanSploy, Darsay)
name_original: Oh Sheep! (Carlos Chamizo Cano, jvicog, GuillermoZexiam, IvanSploy, Darsay)
description:
A game were a wolf has to keep care of his sheeps but also to protect them from yourself.

WASD - movement 

Shift - run 

E - interact (catch sheeps or objects and throw them)

Credits:

Ignacio Molina Casaus  ( @Darsay_Dev ) - programmer

Ivan Rodriguez García  ( @IvanGaroX ) - programmer

Javier Vico Gallego  ( @jvicog ) - programmer

Carlos Chamizo Cano  ( @notsooart ) - 2D/3D art

Guillermo García-Delgado Álvarez  ( @GuilleAsesino ) - 2D/3D art

Javier Balenzategui García  ( @Jayburie ) - music
